Empatica API Key Instructions

Please note: These instructions are from a mobile browser unless otherwise stated.

1. Authenticate online with Empatica

In your browser, go to:

https://www.empatica.com/connect/login.php

Log in using your email & password.

If you have not set up an E4 Connect account do so first with the Create Account link.

2. Get your API key

Make sure you are on the Home Page. Then click on the Developer link

Once there, find the API Key under your Developer Profile section. It will be a 32 alpha-numeric sequence in the following format:

0000000aa0000000aaaa0000000a000a.

Select & Copy the key from the API Key text input field. This will be used later in the StateSong application.

Note: API Keys are associated with a specific device. Ensure that you have added your device purchase code on this page to link your E4 Device with this API Key.

3. Add your Key to the StateSong App

In the Statesong app the API Key dialog will come up on startup if you have not registered your key, you can also access this the API Key Dialog using the Devices menu item at any time.

In the Statesong app API Key dialog screen paste your API Key
